hibernate-mapping.query: select count(*) from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.InstalledSoftware s where s.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar and s.status = 'ACTIVE'
from InstalledSignature i join fetch i.softwareSignature where i.installedSoftware = :installedSoftware and i.softwareSignature.status = 'ACTIVE'
from InstalledFilter i join fetch i.softwareFilter where i.installedSoftware = :installedSoftware and i.softwareFilter.status = 'ACTIVE'
from InstalledSaProduct i join fetch i.saProduct where i.installedSoftware = :installedSoftware and i.saProduct.status = 'ACTIVE'
from InstalledDoranaProduct i join fetch i.doranaProduct where i.installedSoftware = :installedSoftware and i.doranaProduct.status = 'ACTIVE'
from InstalledVmProduct i join fetch i.vmProduct where i.installedSoftware = :installedSoftware and i.vmProduct.status = 'ACTIVE'
from InstalledTadz i join fetch i.softwareItem j join fetch j.mainframeFeature k join fetch k.version l join fetch l.manufacturer where i.installedSoftware = :installedSoftware
from InstalledTadz i join fetch i.softwareItem j join fetch j.mainframeVersion k join fetch k.manufacturer where i.installedSoftware = :installedSoftware

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware.machineType where l.customer = :customer and l.name like :name and (l.hardwareLpar.hardware is null or l.hardwareLpar.hardware.hardwareStatus in (:hardwareStatus)) and l.status in (:status)

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware.machineType where l.name like :name
from Software s where s.softwareName = :name and s.status= 'ACTIVE' order by s.productRole desc, s.comments asc
from Software s where upper(s.softwareName) = :name and s.status= 'ACTIVE' order by s.productRole desc, s.comments asc

from Software s join fetch s.softwareCategory
where upper(s.softwareName) = :softwareName and s.status = 'ACTIVE' order by s.productRole desc
from Software s join fetch s.manufacturer join fetch s.softwareCategory where s.softwareId = :id

FROM Software s JOIN FETCH s.manufacturer WHERE (UPPER(s.softwareName) LIKE :name OR UPPER(s.manufacturer.manufacturerName) LIKE :manufacturer) AND s.productRole = 'SOFTWARE_PRODUCT' AND s.status = 'ACTIVE'
select count(*) from Software s where upper(s.softwareName) like :name or upper(s.manufacturer.manufacturerName) like :manufacturer
from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l join fetch l.customer left join fetch l.softwareLparEff where l.id = :softwareLparId

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l join fetch l.customer left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware.machineType where l.id = :softwareLparId

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l join fetch l.customer left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware.machineType where l.customer = :customer

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l join fetch l.customer left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware.machineType where l.customer = :customer and (l.hardwareLpar.hardware is null or l.hardwareLpar.hardware.hardwareStatus in (:hardwareStatus)) and l.status in (:status) order by l.name

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware.machineType left outer join fetch l.softwareLparEff join fetch l.customer where l.customer = :customer and l.name = :name

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.InstalledSoftware s join fetch s.softwareLpar join fetch s.software join fetch s.software.manufacturer join fetch s.discrepancyType where s.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar order by s.software.softwareName

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.InstalledSoftware s join fetch s.softwareLpar join fetch s.softwareLpar.customer join fetch s.software join fetch s.software.manufacturer join fetch s.discrepancyType where s.id = :id order by s.software.softwareName

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.InstalledSoftware s join fetch s.softwareLpar join fetch s.softwareLpar.customer join fetch s.software join fetch s.software.manufacturer join fetch s.discrepancyType where s.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar and s.software = :software
from SoftwareDiscrepancyH h join fetch h.installedSoftware where h.installedSoftware.id = :softwareId order by h.recordTime desc
from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l join fetch l.customer left join fetch l.softwareLparEff left join fetch l.softwareLparEff.softwareLparEffHs where l.id = :softwareLparId
from LparBankAccount l join fetch l.bankAccount where l.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar

from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l join fetch l.customer left outer join fetch l.softwareLparEff left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware left outer join fetch l.hardwareLpar.hardware.machineType where l.customer = :customer and l.status = 'ACTIVE'
from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l join fetch l.customer left outer join fetch l.softwareLparEff where l.customer = :customer and l.hardwareLpar is null and l.status in (:status)

from Software s
join fetch s.manufacturer join fetch s.softwareCategory
where s.status = 'ACTIVE' and s.manufacturer.manufacturerName = 'MICROSOFT' and s.level = 'LICENSABLE' and s.softwareId not in(select m.microsoftProductMapId from MicrosoftProductMap m)
select count(*) from com.ibm.ea.bravo.software.SoftwareLpar l where l.customer = :customer and l.hardwareLpar is null and l.status in (:status)
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select 1 from manual_queue where software_lpar_id = :softwareLparId and software_id = :softwareId

select coalesce( (select max(id) from installed_signature a where a.installed_software_id = i.id and i.status = 'ACTIVE' ), (select max(id) from installed_filter b where b.installed_software_id = i.id and i.status = 'ACTIVE'), (select max(id) from installed_sa_product c where c.installed_software_id = i.id and i.status = 'ACTIVE'), (select max(id) from installed_dorana_product d where d.installed_software_id = i.id and i.status = 'ACTIVE'), (select max(id) from installed_vm_product e where e.installed_software_id = i.id and i.status = 'ACTIVE' ), (select max(id) from installed_tadz f where f.installed_software_id = i.id and i.status = 'ACTIVE' ), 0 ) from installed_software i where i.id = :installedSoftwareId
